title: 15-Minute Penalty - Leaver Buster on LoLclient.exe failure
body: Seems a bit outrageous that I would be pegged with a 15-minute penalty on a client-side issue. I understand why the leaver buster is there and I love it, but client side errors should not be punished.

replies.body: A [leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)penalty only occurs after multiple games, and not just one.  The system will treat all leaves equally regardless of reason, because it still causes others a negative experience.  If you need any help in resolving whatever is causing you to leave, let me know in more detail an I'll be happy to help!
